nodes.text: Ziemol was a Chiss male who held the title of Speaker in the Chiss Ascendancy's Syndicure, representing the Irizi family. When a Xodlak family delegation visited Ziemol to request sponsorship for their family to return to Ruling Family status, Ziemol handed the issue over to Syndic Irizi'stal'mustro rather than deal with the Xodlak delegation himself, causing Zistalmu to be late for a discreet meeting with Syndic Prime Mitth'urf'ianico.
